A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best Star Wars movie in the Disney era so far. From a technical level\, it is the best Star Wars movie so far\, it's cinematography is rivaled only by Rogue One. It is well acted\, well directed & well edited. Kylo Ren\, Luke Skywalker & Rey are the best parts of the movie. The movie tries to juggle too many ideas & themes\, and can often be self-indulgent in auteur theory at the expense of being accessible to as many Star Wars audience members as possible. But then again\, i'm just a pretentious Star Wars fan who loves themes\, themes\, themes & has always advocated for the writer-director approach to film making\, so it is exactly my type of film. I rank it as my 3rd or 4th favourite Star Wars film.
